commit.message: Decouple CachingRpcTargetResolver from slobrok and fnet implementations and write unit tests.

nodes.bodyText: Consider making this a static member function instead
Could also use [[maybe_unused]] directly on the parameter itself

Should we consider having the factory return shared_ptr instead of unique_ptr? The latter is more obvious that returned objects are unique, the former avoids an extra control block allocation due to make_shared.
Consider removing explicit since the constructor has been updated to take in more than one arg
Consider = default instead of empty body
